item.title: GLG increases its presence in Singapore with office expansion
item.description:
GLG, a professional learning platform connecting professionals with experts for knowledge sharing, has expanded its presence in Singapore with a new and larger office. The company’s CEO, Alexander Saint-Amand, highlighted the rapid growth of GLG’s business in Singapore, emphasizing the region’s significance for the company’s mission to transform professional learning. The new 6,000-square-foot office, located in Singapore’s central business district, can accommodate 64 employees. GLG’s leadership, including Evan Auyang, Head of Asia-Pacific and Managing Director, and David Anderson, Head of GLG Southeast Asia, underscored Singapore’s strategic importance as a business hub and its concentration of leading professionals and companies...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/glg-increases-its-presence-in-singapore-with-office-expansion/

item.title: Tech companies are the most prevalent in the minds of LinkedIn members in the Asia Pacific region
item.description:
IBM, HP, Accenture, Google, and Tata Consultancy Services are the top five most followed companies by LinkedIn’s over 50 million members in the Asia Pacific region. Notably, all these companies are multinational tech companies. [Image of the LinkedIn Top 5 most followed companies] Source: LinkedIn However, this trend varies by country. While Google ranks among the top three in Singapore, Australia, Hong Kong, and Japan, it is absent from the list in India, Indonesia, Malaysia, and New Zealand...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/tech-companies-are-the-most-prevalent-in-the-minds-of-linkedin-members-in-the-asia-pacific-region/
